format:
<template>
    <v-btn @click="gotoserver()">{{ msg.payload }}</v-btn>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
  name: 'MyLink',
  data() {
    return {
        my_link: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    gotoserver: function () {
        window.open(`${this.my_link}`);
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, (msg) => {
        this.my_link = msg.topic
    })
  },
  unmounted () {
    this.$socket.off(`msg-input:${this.id}`)
  }
}
</script>
